name: David Eason
text: I really enjoyed my first experience at Serra Nissan of Sylacauga. I was shopping for a Nissan Rogue. They had a very good variety in stock. My Salesperson was David Vaughn. He was outstanding to deal with. David was very helpful and took all the time I needed to look at the different options. There have only been a few car sales people who I would be willing to deal with again. David Vaughn is in that select group. From our looking, test drive, and eventually negotiating the deal, I could not have been more pleased with my experience. Besides David, his Floor Manager, Ricardo was also very helpful with helping make the deal work. Chad in Finance was great to deal with as well. I highly recommend Serra Nissan of Sylacauga. Ask for David Vaughn!

name: Debra Price
text: Staff went out of their way to show common courtesy and kindness. Marty the sales manager and mattie the sales woman were super. I would highly recommend this dealership. They were fast and we never felt so comfortable.  Thankyou for everything M & M.

name: Linde Williams
text: Codie in the Service Department was great! She really cared about me as a customer and it showed. It's difficult to find great customer service but I received it today!

name: LaTonya Chatman
text: The service staff were all very helpful and nice. I have visited another Nissan dealership for service and they tried to push products and services on me that I did not need but this was not the case. They suggested only services that I need. I did not have to wait all day for my service work to be completed.

name: Janet Hadley
text: I sent an email to Serra Nissan interested in looking for a new, used car. Frank Morris called me to ask me what exactly I was looking for. Within minutes he sent me pictures with options that met my description. I made an appointment to come see him later that afternoon. When we got there Frank had pulled the vehicles I was interested in. We went for a test drive and fell in love with a 2019 Kia Sonata. Frank was incredibly patient with me and never made me feel pressured to make a decision. He worked with his manager and finance to get me exactly what I needed at the price I wanted. He even called a few days later to make sure we were happy with our purchase. I highly recommend Serra Nissan, and ask for Frank!

name: Nancy Smith
text: Great experience with Jaclyn. And sales manager Marty.

name: Quisha Thomas
text: I just want to thank Marty and Madi and everyone that was involved with helping me get my car. Great experience I would definitely recommend sierra Nissan in sylacauga to anyone who needs a car. I was so happy words can't explain.

name: SHELIA JOHNSON
text: Love it, great service from Madi and Hardy...love my new car

name: Eddie Jones (SalesSupermanEddieJones)
text: Great people and awesome cars. Plus, Eddie Jones is there

name: David Fletcher
text:
The entire team at Serra Nissan of Sylacauga were a pleasure to work with. From the moment we stepped on the lot and we’re not swarmed by sales people, to when sales professional David Vaughn showed us the car we were interested in looking at and test driving, to negotiating on the vehicle with David’s manager ( we only had to make our original offer and one counter), to signing paper work with the F&I manager Hatcher. I was happy when we told Hatcher we already had financing, he only asked what our rate was. He then helped us select an extended warranty that was a better deal than what we had from our bank.
My wife hates all the B.S. that happens when you you purchase a car and would rather have a root canal. We would both highly recommend Serra Automotive and sales pro David Vaughn!

text: The stuff is very helpful and kind.

They worked hard to get my business but the lack of customer service is horrible after the sale. Wouldn’t advise dealing with these people. Won’t ever be back.

text: Dont expect these uneducated mechanics to fix your nissan without replacing parts that It doesnt need before they figure out which part is wrong. They charge triple and are mean about it towards the customer! The girls at the front desk are great! But the mechanics are lazy and not nice.

text: I was in Sylacauga (2/10/21) for service for my vehicle.  Onna in the service department was FANTASTIC.  Onna had the best attitude that I've experienced in a long time. Her kindness and willingness to help was outstanding. Onna, YOU ARE AWESOME!!

They took care of my issues faster than we expected and I would highly recommend them to everyone.

text: My experience was very pleasant I think the young lady name Miss Alana she is very friendly and courteous  she is always helpful to me everytime I come to get my oil changed the world need more people like her

text:
CONVENTIONAL OIL & FILTER CHANGE    $39.95
TIRE ROTATION & BALANCE                        $29.95

I was told I needed windshield wipers. I ask how much and the service man said $18. I said ok, go ahead and change them. He did not say per blade. He misrepresented the item.  The price I was charged with discounts is not the problem. I now do not feel I can trust your service staff without questioning their ability to treat the customer fairly. I never had a problem with the Nissan in Carrollton, Ga with years of service.

She also informed me of what service needs my car will  need in the near future. No pressure just a nice "heads up" ! I wish all service personnel were as nice as Sharon !

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Connell for the great review! Alana and Sharon, our service writers here at Serra Nissan are amazing!!

name: Jeanne Smith
text: We found the exact car we wanted. The sales part was seamless. There was a wait to get in with the finance office as there was only one for three dealerships. The follow-up on issues from our salesman was non-existent. He said he’d order things and never did. After two calls to him I spoke to the sales manager and I think we’re going to get satisfaction. Overall, the team was personable and mostly professional. I would recommend Serra Nissan.

resp.text: Ms. Smith, I just wanted to let you know that we have ordered your owner's manual and key fob. We will be calling you when it comes in. Thank you for being a valued customer of Serra Nissan of Sylacauga!!

name: Yakeshia Dates
text: The lady took GREAT care of me at the Sylacauga Serra Nissan name Sharon. I was very pleased with her service. She is always very nice and polite.

name: terese c
text: I was not impressed with the hospitality, of the service department. In the pass I would take my cars here. When I bought my daughter a car she brings it here. So I do not come often. The staff is entirely different! The service department was the only reason I continued to purchase cars from this location in the past. Anyone can sale me a car, salesmen are all the same. But the service department keeps my new car in good condition. Service wasn't bad, just not what I was use to. Miss Kim, Ken.......Andrea❤!

name: Lisa G.
text: It's a awesome place everyone was great in the service department and parts. Mrs Sharon , Tabitha and David are people that go out of there way to make me very pleased that I purchased my car here and that having my car serviced here is always in good hands. Thanks guys awesome job.

name: Destiny Moon
text: The tech was very resourceful and polite he gave great conversations just a very good experience

name: Melanie Nelson
text: Although Jeff Adams wasn't our salesman, he spent 2 and 1/2 hours with me helping me get the vehicle that I really wanted.   Mr. Jeff Adams is a tremendous asset to this dealership, and if we ever look to trade or buy, I will ONLY do business with him.  He didn't benefit at all from those hours with me, but he never hesitated to be right there, available, by phone and text even after leaving the dealership that afternoon.  Offering advice, encouragement and kindness.  Sometimes you need more than a knowledgeable salesman, sometimes you need a compassionate, considerate human being with commission or profit not the first thought.  This was my first new car purchase in over 32 years, and I would definitely recommend friends to shop here.

name: Tyler Norwood
text: The girls behind the counter in the parts and service department have gone out of their way to help with warranty info, setting appointments, etc to try to get an ongoing problem with my truck fixed. They definitely deserve 5 starts. Now if only the mechanics could diagnose and fix the issue...but, that’s been a problem with every dealership  ive taken it to so that’s no really just on Serra Nissan.

name: Philip Hopper
text: Everyone at Serra made my buying experience flow easily. There was no pressure like I have had at previous car lots.  Each person in the process from the online account rep to the sales person to the finance team was knowledgable and helpful in making my purchase. They even brought my vehicle to me the next day after fixing one of the tires . Only negative thing was having to go down the road to another building to do all the finance work.

name: Peggy Caine
text: You all was very nice and did a good job on my car and truck..Thank you Peggy Wesson

text: David Compton was the absolutely most helpful person.  My little Nissan need something and he knew exactly what I need and  even took the time to explain the steps for getting my Nissan looking great as always!  10/10 would recommend David  to another person in need.

name: John E Clough
text: Efficiency and knowledge seemed to be motto. Made an extra effort to show me a friendly pleasant service visit. All of the staff that I came in contact with acted as though my reason for visiting was important.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review, Mr. Clough. It was a joy talking to you this morning.

text: I have been to this service center before and it didn't take as long and I was semi prepared for a wait on a Friday....however I did not think it would be close to 2 hours. The lady that checked me in went to lunch for an hour and came back and was shocked that I was still waiting and no one had even acknowledged that it had been so long. A tip would probably be to update customers with an estimated wait time. But the staff were friendly and were pleasant just busy and overworked or either they lacked a system for managing the customers.

text: Sales was a great experience but when you have defect on your vehicle and have to get it fixed expect it to take several days for a simple fix and to be refused a loaner vehicle while waiting on your busy day to day life.

text: Rachael was great she went above and beyond to make sure I was taken care of. I love the car just wish they had cleaned it better there is still food crumbs and glue on the steering wheel

resp.text: Rachel is a wonderful sales person. I'm glad you had a great experience with us. Please call me so we can schedule a time for you to come in and get your car fully detailed.

name: Jayme Moore
text: If I could give zero stars, I would. Worst experience I have ever had with a car dealership. We test drove a new Titan and were quoted a price. After shopping around, and them blowing my phone up, we called/texted back and were told they would honor the quote given by two different people, including a manager. We made sure of this prior to going, as it is a bit of a drive. When we arrived, they had myseteriously lost our information and the quote they had just referenced on a call the day before from the manager. We refilled out everything, and suddenly the quote was $43k instead of the $38k we were offered previously and told over the phone they would honor. When I called them on the discrepancy, they suddenly started saying that the quote had been on a used Titan, even though they didn't have any used Titans on the lot, and we had driven and looked at four different new ones. The manager on duty (different from the one I had talked to multiple times on the phone), talked down to us and said it was a "misunderstanding". We presented the facts, but the manager blew us off, so we walked out.  They deliberately mislead us, lied, and tried to slide a higher price in on us, even though we had an agreement prior to arrival. I will never do business with Serra in any capacity after this experience.

name: Shun Drake
text: I have always had a great experience at Serra Nissan in Sylacauga Alabama. Morgan was very knowledgeable and helpful when I came into the dealership looking to trade vehicles. Morgan walked be through the entire process and she answered all my questions.

text: They worked hard and got us the best deal, better than what we expected.

text: I had my car towed in due to the alternator going out. They got right to work on it and had it repaired in no time! Thank you to Kenny Stewart and Alana for your hard work!

name: Alfred Wahnish
text: This was the easiest new car purchase experience I've ever had, and over the last 50 years, I've had many!  I was able to conduct the major part of the price negotiation over the phone with the Internet Specialist prior to my going to the dealership in Sylacauga.  Other dealerships I contacted were reluctant to do this and wanted me to be on their lot to "show my commitment".   I didn't want to spend the day haggling, so I went where I was able to have a meaningful dialogue.  Once on Serra's premises, I was treated courteously and they were very respectful of my time.  The whole process took just over 2 hours, and I was driving off in our 2018 Murano!  I would highly recommend giving them a call!  It's worth the drive!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review. I will gladly pass this on to your salesperson.

name: Teresa Maxwell
text:
This place is full of biased and bigoted Management. I went there today because I supposedly won a $500 gift card from Walmart.  I was wearing tennis shoes, sweat pants and a tee shirt. No make-up and my hair was in a ponytail. I showed the "Winning" circular to the management and I sure  did win a card from Walmart. One for $5 not $500 like the circular said I had won. NO ONE tried to even sell me a car. I was dismissed by the person that told me I had only won $5. If , sometime in the future, I need a vehicle, I will NOT go to this place nor recommend  this place to anyone.
I truly believe if I had been "dressed to the nines" I would have been treated better.

text: My son & I had some issues with the paperwork, our names listed incorrectly on the financial institution paperwork but on the title paperwork for the Alabama license dept was correct.  I had to call the financial institution we were using to purchase the vehicle to get it corrected.  The gentlemen completing our paperwork could never be reached & I found out later was fired.  I was never informed when my car matts would be in, I had to call multiple times.  Apparently several other managers were let go.  The one person who helped me and communicated with me was Laci Branch and helped get everything resolved.  Hopefully the new management is following through their commitments to the customer.  I would give them another shot on my next car because pricing was good, worth the hour drive, 2012 Nissan Murano purchased has been a good dependable vehicle so far, and Laci did a excellent job fixing the problems we had..

resp.text: Mr. Flanagan, my name is Dena Napier-George. I am the Owner Loyalty Manager here at Nissan. I'm touching base with you to make sure that everything is okay with your Murano now. Please get in touch with me via email at dnapiergeorge@serraautomotive.com or feel free to contact me at 256-5000 ext. 2518 I will be here until 5:30 today.

text: They called and asked me to come in for a great deal. I drove from Pell City. I was informed my credit would only allow for a new car when I had wanted a pre-owned car. They showed me a basic Versa with nothing extra. I'm thinking if the payment is low enough... $410 a month for 7 years. That included an extended warranty I didn't ask for. I would pay for the car in a year and a half with those payments. So what's the 7 years about? I left. Got a message, great news, we can work with you. I came back, same story and deal. Why waste my time? I didn't call you, you called me. This place is a joke.

The company gave NO effort to help pay for or help like a company should. I am a full time working college student and will have to take out a large loan to fix the WHOLE transmission.

name: Jamie Martin
text: Very disappointed!  I called Serra on Dec 12, 2015 to inquire about a car on their website.  It seemed like an awesome price.  However, I didn't want to drive to Sylacauga from Cullman without more info. The dealer I spoke to proceeded (as expected) to sell me a new car rather than the used one I called about.  He finally said he would go to the used lot across the street to check on the car I called about.  He called me back and said they haven't ever had the car that I called about and that their internet guy makes lots of mistakes.  I checked the internet today (Dec 15) and the car is still listed. Instead of the well priced $15999, it is now listed at a more logical $19900.  I don't appreciate being told a lie.  I would have probably bought the car Saturday at the advertised price.  I would have even appreciated being told the appropriate price more than being told a lie.

text: Sonia was fabulous!  Our daughter needed a car quickly.  Sonia was able to find her the perfect car and get the deal done in 24 hours even though we are more than 900 miles away!  The easiest car buying experience we have ever had.

name: D Rogers
text: Very impressed with the service and friendliness of the staff. Dealership waiting area was clean and comfortable with bottled water and coffee available.  Had a waiting area in showroom area (nice and bright) and a second area with a television in a viewer friendly area. TV had a remote available for choosing channels. Nice work space with charging stations available for those wishing to take care of business.  I had scheduled an oil change and tire rotation and feel it was done within a reasonable time frame.  Enjoyed chatting with other individuals my age and will be going back to this dealership.

name: Jim Sutton
text:
Rebuild brake system master cylinder, re-surface front rotors, new front brake pads, flush/replace brake fluid. Fixed "mushy" brake pedal feel, seems to be a competent brake job.
Negatively, it took EIGHT BUSINESS DAYS to accumulate the parts needed for this routine kind of maintenance/repair.  In the meantime after we inquired about progress every day or so (we were never proactively informed), each time we were told the parts would be in the next day's delivery.
I'm not saying all of this is the establishment's fault, just relating the overall frustration of the experience.
One star for the experience, four stars for what seems to be an effective repair.

name: Erik Hess
text: Very professional staff. My family and I were on vacation from Knoxville, TN and our 2012 Murano started running really high RPMs. Turns out the car needed a new transmission. The Sandy Sanding staff weren't able to get the parts they needed for the repair from their regular parts suppliers. However, they were able to locate another dealership that had the parts...in Atlanta. Jessie from their service department took an overnight drive to Atlanta to retrieve the parts while the service techs removed the old transmission. Needless to say they went above and beyond to get the work done quickly. The car was dropped off on a Monday morning and was back in my hands with a new transmission by the following Thursday afternoon. That's 4 days from diagnosis to work completion. I couldn't be happier with this turn around. Especially considering the trip to Atlanta for the parts. I highly recommend this team for any repair needs you might have.

name: Omega Phillips
text:
The tech that worked on the truck was good, I suppose never seen him.
But Leon the service person that checked me in was rude.
I asked him how long it would take,after he informed me my 8:40 appointment was not at all accurate, and only one person works on diesels.Leon said if you make your appointment online that's just a time they give you- to work you in. I said well if I knew that then I would not have made the appointment for that time.
All I was really there for was alignment(that takes about a hour)he asked why I said because we purchased new tires. Leon said well why didn't they do it then. I said we bought them in Cameron after the hurricane hit, we were lucky to get tires.
(It should not matter why I wanted a alignment just put it in the computer)
Then I said how long will it take, will he give me a update when he speaks to the tech-since he already told me the 8:40 really didn't mean anything.
He said if you would let me talk,

name: Robert Bates
text: Stay away! They are deceptive and cheats. I bought a truck from them at an outrageous price (had no options at the time and needed a truck A.S.A.P. for business) and I have spent over $5,000 fixing it in the 6 months I've owned it. I was told by Lee and the "salesman" that the truck was $11,000, only to charge me $13,000. Of course once I realized what they did and contacted them they play dumb and it is too late. I know if I should have taken more time to review and ask questions but it was the end of the day, past business hours already and I needed to leave with the truck that day. Regardless you should never practice those business ethics in any industry. I have had to change the rotors, brakes, brake drums, brake cylinder, master cylinder, calipers and brackets, hub assembly, CV axles, steering arm, I am in the process of changing the transfer case (over $2,000 on it's own) and it still needs a steering column, gear box, front differential, driveshaft and possibly the rear differential. When it's all said and done I will have put at least 5 times the value of this truck into making it run right and paying it off. I am a self employed remodeler and I have missed countless days of work, lost countless jobs and it's gotten to the point that I am having trouble paying for my daughters daycare and buying her essentials. This whole deal has radically ruined my life. These people knew the situation I was in and absolutely took full advantage. Beware!!!

resp.text: Hi Robert, I am so sorry to hear about the terrible experience you had with A&M Auto Sales. Our management has changed since then. We now have a great team behind us to help with any issues with the vehicles for future or current customers!
